/* ========= Embed Power BI ========= */

/* ========= Reveal ========= */
.be-reveal{
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(10px);
  transition: opacity .45s ease, transform .45s ease;
}
.be-reveal.is-visible{ opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }

}

/* tables */

.be-bullets{ margin:.65rem 0 .2rem; padding-left: 1.05rem; opacity:.92; }

@media (max-width: 980px){
  .be-products{ grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
}

/* ========= SECCIONES EN PANEL (AUTO-WRAP CON JS) ========= */
.be-section{

  padding: 1.05rem 1.05rem .95rem;

}
.be-section h2{ margin-top: .15rem; }
.be-section h2 + p{ margin-top: .45rem; }
.be-section > :last-child{ margin-bottom: 0; }

/* Callout m√°s premium */
.callout-note{
  border-radius: 16px !important;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.12) !important;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.03) !important;
}

<script>
(function(){
  // 1) Reveal on scroll
  const els = document.querySelectorAll('.be-reveal');
  const io = new IntersectionObserver((entries)=>{
    entries.forEach(e=>{
      if(e.isIntersecting){
        e.target.classList.add('is-visible');
        io.unobserve(e.target);
      }
    });
  }, {threshold: 0.12});
  els.forEach(el=>io.observe(el));

  // 2) Scroll suave para anclas (evita que el sticky tape t√≠tulos)
  document.querySelectorAll('.be-topnav a[href^="#"]').forEach(a=>{
    a.addEventListener('click', (ev)=>{
      const id = a.getAttribute('href');
      const el = document.querySelector(id);
      if(!el) return;
      ev.preventDefault();
      const y = el.getBoundingClientRect().top + window.scrollY - 86;
      window.scrollTo({top:y, behavior:'smooth'});
      history.replaceState(null, '', id);
    });
  });

  // 3) Envolver secciones (sin tocar tu markdown)
  // Busca los H2 con ids espec√≠ficos y envuelve TODO lo que sigue hasta el pr√≥ximo H2.
  function wrapSectionById(id){
    const h2 = document.getElementById(id);
    if(!h2) return;
    if(h2.closest('.be-section')) return;

    const wrapper = document.createElement('section');
    wrapper.className = 'be-shell be-section be-reveal';
    h2.parentNode.insertBefore(wrapper, h2);

    let node = h2;
    while(node){
      const next = node.nextSibling;
      wrapper.appendChild(node);
      if(next && next.nodeType === 1 && next.tagName === 'H2') break;
      node = next;
    }
  }

  ['demo','meta','ga4','gastos','incluye','faq'].forEach(wrapSectionById);

  // Re-observar reveal para wrappers creados din√°micamente
  document.querySelectorAll('.be-reveal:not(.is-visible)').forEach(el=>io.observe(el));
})();
</script>
